segments.text: Did you get a nice tree ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure did . It's a beauty . Where do you want it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's go to work . We want to have the tree ready to light up by evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's string the lights first.Then we won't have to mess up the decorations .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hand me some globes and paper flowers , I'll put them on these top branches .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I guess we're all set for another merry Christmas .
segments.speaker: S2
